Understate: The claim understates the fact that Donald Trump made the statement about dropping out of the race in October 2015, not recently.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or source to back up the statement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Donald Trump did not recently say on Meet the Press that he would drop out of the presidential race if polls showed him losing to Hillary Clinton.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Donald Trump's statement was about the general election, when in fact it was about the long race for the Republican nomination.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the statement was made in a different context and not related to the general election.
